About.title: About Yuri
About.description: Yuri is a native Portuguese teacher with over 10 years of experience. He has helped hundreds of students from all over the world to learn Portuguese and achieve their goals.

Features.title: Why learn with me?
Features.subtitle: Learning Portuguese with me is not just about acquiring a new language: it's about opening yourself up to new personal, professional, and cultural opportunities. My classes are designed for you to learn in a practical, entertaining, and fully adapted way to your pace. Whether you need to communicate on a trip, advance in your career, or connect with people from Brazil, I offer you close support, updated material, and tools that really work. I invite you to live an effective, flexible, and motivating learning experience.
Features.feature1_description: Study plans tailored to you. Personalized for your level and goals.
Features.feature2_description: Schedules that adapt to your routine.
Features.feature3_description: You will notice your progress from day one.

Testimonials.title: What my students say

Testimonials.testimonial2: The best decision to learn Portuguese. Yuri is a patient and dedicated teacher, and his classes are very entertaining.
Testimonials.testimonial3: Thanks to Yuri, I can now communicate fluently in Portuguese. Totally recommended!
